storyInfo: Alone in search atop the mountain, Lee runs into Nian, and is caught by Zuo Le. Nian leads this party of three to the mountain that by all rights should have been destroyed, Xunri, and they finally lay eyes upon the pavilion.

attributes.content: Where's it gone...?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Ao-ao!
attributes.name: Waregeist

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's on that branch over there... and there's a great seething mass of oddities beneath it...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Ao...
attributes.name: Waregeist

attributes.content: Haha. How do I fetch this now, then...?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: A counter of black.
All things have their needs. These waregeists' dispositions correspond with the 'desires' of the wares.
So, the ones who roused me...
Is it my young sister who hunches over scrolls splashing ink into scapes, or that young sister in words of gold, who makes it so when she speaks?
Or...
Was it only him as he threw a piece down, with a momentary clack?
Out of the way.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Wrr—wrwwrr!
attributes.name: Waregeist

attributes.content: Long time no see.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Hm? You're a... Rhodes Islander...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Aww. So it was just old Lee.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Still, long time no see. What dragged you from Lungmen to Shangshu?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Hey, what do you mean he took his sword and left? He went to fight someone?
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Who knows.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: None of us new ones've ever seen him use it before. Yeah, come to think of it, he's been getting his business big. Got himself stable in Shangshu just with his restaurants.
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: What's his style with his sword?
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: He really hasn't used it all that much these days. To be honest, he just cuts melons, dices leaves, chops meat and handles fins.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: His fighting days are long behind. It's been a long time since he ever went to, well, 'harm' anyone with a blade.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: He's sorta retired from all the business, then, that type? So what's he gonna do with it out there now?
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Dice, I guess. He's been dicing for so long, it's the only thing he knows how to do now.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: That's lame.
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Well, duh. What, is dicing vegetables for ages going to power you up?
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Good technique! Seems you didn't just stay an innkeeper all these years!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: No, I really haven't used it since then.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I'm used to counting my chips, sorting out my needs... I never thought I'd still be so able with this frostblade of mine.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: It's surprising.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: What would winning or losing even mean, if I met a Zheng Qingyue depressed and joyless? It hung on my mind.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: It seems heaven must have willed this.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: —Heaven who? You're just obsessed with getting revenge!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Urgh...!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Ye! Don't interfere! Go after that Lungmenite, and find the goblet!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Sorry, dad, but you're not in charge here now—
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Ugh!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I predicted this from you.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I never once laid a hand on her.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You'll regret this.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Uncle Taihe, You help the innkeeper out.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You, young man?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I'll search for the cup. It can't wait any longer.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hold it!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Stop there!
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Er, let's not be too hasty with the rocks now. Pull any more away and we'll be stranded up here, wouldn't you say?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: The struggling of the cornered.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Benefactor! I'll hold out here! You go help Brother Lee! Don't let that kid get away with it!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Right! You watch yourself!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Now, you really must stop with the bullying here. The only reason I've not kicked into action is because you're a mandarin, after all—
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Is that why?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I repay Lord Zuo's patronage. I go with him. My status has nothing to do with this.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Come! Disciple of Lien, you and I contest purely as martial men. We shall test each other.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Then, don't mind if I do!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Rain?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Is it raining?
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Shoot, the forecast promised it'd be sunny today.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Sir, it's raining. Would you like to come inside and take a seat?
attributes.name: Teahouse Assistant

attributes.content: No, thank you.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Are you rainviewing? That's a good hobby, sir. I'll bring an umbrella in just a moment...
attributes.name: Teahouse Assistant

attributes.content: Where's the boatman who was with you?
attributes.name: Teahouse Assistant

attributes.content: He went to the mountains.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Right now? He might be stuck up there once it's dark.
attributes.name: Teahouse Assistant

attributes.content: Yes, right now.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: It was a favor for me.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Ah! It's that Lungmenite!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Are the Waregeists surrounding him...? Hold on, who's that next to him?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Oh. Looks like we've got new guests.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Nian...!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Here to squabble over the cup too?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Phew. That's a few less people than I was expecting.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I am Zuo Le, Candleholder of the Sui Regulator of Great Yan. By Master Tai's instruction, I am confidentially investigating Dusk and the black goblet's whereabouts.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Ao... ao...
attributes.name: Waregeist

attributes.content: These little things seem quite scared of you.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: If they're scared of me, hey, I get it. But this li'l boy here...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What's that you've got on you?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You're swift.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Uh-huh... I see... Just like that old-ass guy said.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: So how'd you get tangled up in this party, Mr. Lee?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I think that's a bit of a long story, Miss Nian...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But I'm very sorry I pulled a handful of Rhodes Island's operators in as well.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: No big. If Kroos and li'l Lava couldn't handle this stuff, they'd never get to see things wrap up.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Well, well. You really haven't changed, Miss Nian...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Lemme tell you, we've been through a whole drama these last two days. That scary old guy did tell us a few things, though.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Including how the Sui Regulator and Ministry of Rites aren't quite getting along. Hey, kid, are your bunch really in such a hurry... to get rid of us?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: There's gotta be some reason, other than me pulling Dusk out of her hidey-hole without a permission slip.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: C'mon, hit me with it. If it makes sense, I might just change my mind and help you out, y'know?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: It's none of your concern.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But if you're showing of your own accord, then all the better...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Where is she?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Who?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Stop playing the fool!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Sheesh. You climbed the wrong mountain, then.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: She's at the summit. The top of the tallest peak in this whole sea of clouds.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Did you try checking up there yet?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: There's nothing in the Field of Forgotten Water. It's no different than an ordinary mountain.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: That so?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: —! Don't touch that cup—!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Oh... if it isn't Nian?
Long time no see.
W-What?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: This, right here, right now, THIS is the highest point in all of the Shangshu Mountains.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: 'Highest point' isn't really a 'right here, right now' sort of definition, ya know.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I say: A summit is only consummate by a beautiful view.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What does the highest point really mean in a physical sense, anyway? If I set down a chair here, that's one step higher, right?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: This place... I think I must've...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Seen it in a dream?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You know something after all, Miss Nian.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Of course. You and this thing've been together for way too long.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Sure, ordinary humans might not figure the goblet's secret, but you and the Sui Regulator have been way off the ball, seriously...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Or maybe, that was part of your plan too...?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Nian?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Nah. Let's not get into me for now... That kid there looks like he's bursting to say something, huh?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Firstly, I need you to give an explanation for Dusk's departure.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Ms. Kroos persists in regarding you as a Rhodes Islander. Thus, all three of you here have some relation to the company.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: In accordance with your answers and this incident's resolution... I will consider penning a letter to the imperial court, with grave regard to this matter.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Urgh...!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Dragging Dusk off was my call entirely. Rhodes Island just accepted a personal request of mine. That satisfy you?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: No. Any time the twelve of you meet, exchange messages or converse is a major strain on the Sui Regulator's nerves. How can you be ignorant of that?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Oh, that's some mature words for such a young kid...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Who's the boss of the Sui Regulator now? Anyone I know?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You've been idle for too long. The human realm has gone through changes.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Dang.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Where's Dusk? And where's Ling?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: And what intent do you three have, assembling in Shangshu? And what secrets... does this goblet hide?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You guys asked someone to get the cup from Lungmen, duh. How's that our fault?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You know the significance of us necessitating it be in the Sui Regulator's hands—
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: —Of course. This thing's got a chunk of my good ol' second bro's conscious jailed in it.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You're well-aware. Then it's exceedingly hard to consider any of you here unaware or innocent.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I wasn't going to pretend to be unaware... even though Liang Xun really didn't tell me a thing.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hahah. Might've been stretching it a little when I kept saying Rhodes Island didn't know anything?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Yeah, I'd say, seeing how you're a casualty.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I only just realized it. And you Sui Regulator guys, c'mon, you spent all these years with nothing to do but think about it and you still couldn't get there?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: The Feranmut is not only able to separate parts of itself into proxies with independent personalities, but can store its consciousness within certain mediums in order to roam...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But can your proxies really do the same thing over again? Just as if you were an Ursus matryoshka.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I don't know if we can or not... Maybe it's a new trick he came up with.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: So he can collect all hundred and eighty-one black stones or something like that.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Wouldn't he go mad?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I mean, he's already gone mad, though. With him locked up in the capital, it's not like you can't pay him a visit.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Meeting with him would be the greatest taboo.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You Sui Regulator people have done so much, and you still care?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What about Dusk? What did you seek Dusk for? And why did you come here after doing so?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: ...I have an idea.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: According to the records, you're always full of ideas.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hm... I guess you actually know a little about me, huh?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: (She's looking this way...)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I want...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...to come up with a way to wipe out that giant thing.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Rain.
A drizzle of spring rain.
A boatman who sails the waterways, at this moment, travels through the towering mountains.
It's almost dark.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Climbing up and down like this really wracks my old body...
attributes.name: Boatman
